Review Text: I only ordered them to clear out a gift card balance they didn’t stick very well and they’re kind of weird I mean who wants a squid or an octopus tattoo
Review Title: Don’t
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ALICE Long Black Wig with Bangs, 26" Extra Long Straight Synthetic Cosplay Party Wig for Women
Review Date: 2019/07/26
Store: ALICE
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'ALICE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '12.3 x 6.9 x 1.8 inches; 11.22 Ounces'}
Review Text: Began to tangle badly just trying to remove the hairnet it came in. The cap is oddly shaped and no combs to hold it in place. And that’s the good features! The bangs looked like they were trimmed with a broken bottle! Upon closer inspection the cap is shaped oddly because it is stretched! Which combined with the bangs make me fear it is used!! EWWWW!! I hope it doesn’t have lice in it!😱  as I have said in several reviews I can’t understand how anybody gave it a good one if I could afford it I would buy five of them and just see if there’s five different ones that show up I don’t know how else it is possible! With all due respect I feel compelled to say Amazon you have a good reputation and I like your service but when you’re that big maybe you should vett your vendors a little bit better. I am definitely returning it but I think I’m gonna put on the stick and spinet around for a while first so that they don’t push it off on somebody else when they get it back.(the seller I mean, I don’t think Amazon would do that!)
Review Title: HOW could this atrocious wig get good reviews
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LangerHair 613# Blonde 13×6 Inch Lace Front Wigs Kanekalon Synthetic Silky Straight Hair Wigs for Woman Half Hand Tied Heat Resistant 22 Inch

Review Text: Silky smooth and natural feel. Will update with more info and more or less stars after I see how it holds up to being worn.
Review Title: Good so far will update after using

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual exhibits a clear preference for aesthetic enhancements, particularly through body art and wigs, emphasizing realistic appearances and good quality. Ratings reveal a tendency to favor highly rated items, especially those that rate above 4.0, indicating a quality sensitivity. However, there are notable inconsistencies in satisfying experiences; high expectations were met with disappointment in certain products, suggesting a nuanced evaluation of quality versus price. 

Common themes emerge around temporary body art and synthetic wigs used for special occasions or personal expression, reflecting an interest in creativity and transformation. Material quality is essential, with favorable impressions of realistic textures, and functionality is crucial, as evidenced by comments on longevity and wearability. 

Price sensitivity appears moderate, as the shopper values quality without delving into excessively high-priced alternatives. Overall, while they appreciate vibrant and trendy choices, the crucial elements of comfort, durability, and authentic appearance drive their purchasing decisions. They may also be willing to adjust their opinions based on usage experiences, particularly regarding how products hold up over time.
